original_text:
rebellion and treachery against the Lord,
    turning our backs on our God,
inciting revolt and oppression,
    uttering lies our hearts have conceived.
korean_text: 우리가 여호와를 배반하고 속였으며 우리 하나님을 따르는 데에서 돌이켜 포학과 패역을 말하며 거짓말을 마음에 잉태하여 낳으니

sentences.original_text: rebellion and treachery against the Lord
turning our backs on our God
uttering lies our hearts have conceived
